[ar:XXXTentacion/Trippie Redd/PnB Rock]

[00:00.41]bad vibes forever (Explicit) - XXXTentacion/Trippie Redd/PnB Rock
[00:03.05]Lyrics by：Jahseh Onfroy/Michael Lamar White II/Rakim Hasheem Allen/Robert Soukiasyan
[00:06.67]Composed by：John Cunningham
[00:09.09]XXXTENTACION：
[00:14.76]Ooh-ooh-ooh got you grindin' all on that
[00:18.51]Ridin' on that thang make a young n***a eyes roll in my brain
[00:21.50]What we gon' do-ooh-ooh I can barely keep control
[00:25.81]Catch the vibe with me get the feel with me vibe with me
[00:29.63]Ooh-ooh-ooh got you grindin' all on that
[00:33.21]Ridin' on that thang make a young n***a eyes roll in my brain
[00:36.28]What we gon' do-ooh-ooh I can barely keep control
[00:40.60]Catch the vibe with me get the feel with me vibe with me
[00:43.47]Trippie Redd：
[00:43.77]I said hey put your pride right to the side
[00:47.55]Yeah
[00:48.03]I can waste your time or I can change your life I said now
[00:52.15]Oh-oh-oh shawty where you goin'
[00:55.42]I just need one moment so baby keep your focus
[00:58.62]I said stay stay babe
[01:03.28]Stay stay with me
[01:06.95]Stay stay babe
[01:10.73]Please don't run away please don't stray away
[01:13.65]XXXTENTACION/PnB Rock：
[01:14.05]Ooh-ooh-ooh got you grindin' all on that
[01:17.52]Ridin' on that thang make a young n***a eyes roll in my brain
[01:20.57]What we gon' do-ooh-ooh I can barely keep control
[01:24.86]Catch the vibe with me get the feel with me vibe with me
[01:27.96]Oh yeah
[01:28.47]PnB Rock：
[01:28.71]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[01:30.05]Yeah
[01:30.35]I can barely keep control
[01:31.89]Control
[01:32.16]When you're grindin' all on me bitin' all on me
[01:34.21]Girl you take my soul yeah
[01:36.00]Yeah
[01:36.23]Ooh-ooh-ooh you look like the girl of my dreams
[01:39.58]Dreams
[01:40.06]My heart is on lock and the key
[01:41.58]Key
[01:41.95]It's right in your pocket you see
[01:43.44]All sex no stress
[01:44.85]Stress
[01:45.24]I ain't tryna hold you back
[01:46.72]Back
[01:47.09]Ice on who bought you that
[01:48.53]Ice
[01:48.93]Don't want you to go out sad
[01:50.41]Sad
[01:50.79]Girl you know I'm fallin' for you
[01:52.24]Yeah
[01:52.60]And girl you know I'm all in for you
[01:54.10]Yeah
[01:54.50]And I'm in love with you-ooh-ooh everything you do-ooh-ooh
[01:58.01]XXXTENTACION：
[01:58.27]Ooh-ooh-ooh got you grindin' all on that
[02:01.80]Ridin' on that thang make a young n***a eyes roll in my brain
[02:04.91]What we gon' do-ooh-ooh I can barely keep control
[02:09.09]Catch the vibe with me get the feel with me vibe with me
data.trans:
[ti:bad vibes forever (Explicit)]
[ar:XXXTentacion/Trippie Redd/PnB Rock]
[al:A Love Letter To You 4 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.41]//
[00:03.05]//
[00:06.67]//
[00:09.09]//
[00:14.76]今晚给我全力以赴
[00:18.51]不要停下来 一直到最后 兄弟 我思前想后
[00:21.50]我们应该做什么 我几乎快要失去控制
[00:25.81]感受我的情绪 体会我的感觉 在我的面前
[00:29.63]今晚给我全力以赴
[00:33.21]不要停下来 一直到最后 兄弟 我思前想后
[00:36.28]我们应该做什么 我几乎快要失去控制
[00:40.60]感受我的情绪 体会我的感觉 在我的面前
[00:43.47]//
[00:43.77]我说 放下你的自尊
[00:47.55]//
[00:48.03]我可以浪费你的时间 我也可以改变你的人生
[00:52.15]姑娘 你要去哪里
[00:55.42]我只需要一点时间 所以宝贝 集中精神
[00:58.62]我说 留下来 不要走 宝贝
[01:03.28]留在我身边
[01:06.95]留在我身边 宝贝
[01:10.73]请不要逃跑 请不要离开
[01:13.65]//
[01:14.05]今晚给我全力以赴
[01:17.52]不要停下来 一直到最后 兄弟 我思前想后
[01:20.57]我们应该做什么 我几乎快要失去控制
[01:24.86]感受我的情绪 体会我的感觉 在我的面前
[01:27.96]//
[01:28.47]//
[01:28.71]//
[01:30.05]//
[01:30.35]我几乎快要失去控制
[01:31.89]控制
[01:32.16]当你和我缠缠绵绵时
[01:34.21]姑娘 你占据了我的灵魂
[01:36.00]//
[01:36.23]你看起来就像我的梦中女孩
[01:39.58]梦想
[01:40.06]我的心上了锁 需要一把钥匙
[01:41.58]钥匙
[01:41.95]钥匙就在你的口袋里
[01:43.44]失去知觉 没有压力
[01:44.85]压力
[01:45.24]我不想阻止你
[01:46.72]阻止
[01:47.09]你戴着钻石 谁给你买的
[01:48.53]钻石
[01:48.93]不想让你伤心离去
[01:50.41]伤心
[01:50.79]姑娘 你知道我仰慕你
[01:52.24]//
[01:52.60]姑娘 你知道我对你全心全意
[01:54.10]//
[01:54.50]我爱上了你 爱上了你的一切
[01:58.01]//
[01:58.27]今晚给我全力以赴
[02:01.80]不要停下来 一直到最后 兄弟 我思前想后
[02:04.91]我们应该做什么 我几乎快要失去控制
[02:09.09]感受我的情绪 体会我的感觉 在我的面前
